Label.en: Are you having trouble showing your love lately ?
Label.fr: Are you having trouble showing your love lately ?
Label.es: Are you having trouble showing your love lately ?

Label.en: I can see you are usually showing your love with hugs, but I suggest you sometimes rather go for flowers instead
Label.fr: I can see you are usually showing your love with hugs, but I suggest you sometimes rather go for flowers instead
Label.es: I can see you are usually showing your love with hugs, but I suggest you sometimes rather go for flowers instead

Label.en: I do not want to alarm you, but that may change soon. I can see you always showing your love with hugs when sometimes, just simple flowers would be appreciated.
Label.fr: I do not want to alarm you, but that may change soon. I can see you always showing your love with hugs when sometimes, just simple flowers would be appreciated.
Label.es: I do not want to alarm you, but that may change soon. I can see you always showing your love with hugs when sometimes, just simple flowers would be appreciated.
